examples.example: 我们的班长总是积极地组织各种活动，带领大家共同进步。

translate.english: Our monitor always actively organizes various activities and leads everyone to make progress together.

examples.example: 班长热情地帮助同学们解决各种问题，大家都很喜欢他。

translate.english: The monitor helps the classmates solve all kinds of problems enthusiastically, and everyone likes him very much.

examples.example: 班长以身作则，为同学们树立了良好的榜样。

translate.english: The monitor sets an example by himself/herself and sets a good example for the classmates.
